RuleSet.Name: src/SchemaDb2LUWSchema.java
RuleSet.Descr: Java 11 DB/2 LUW Jdbc DbIO implementation
RuleSet.GenRule: $iterate SchemaRefs( each ApplyJavaDb2LUWSchemaObjImport empty empty )$
$reference RefSchema JavaDb2LUWSchemaObjImport$
$iterate SchemaRefs( each ApplyJavaDb2LUWSchemaObjMembers empty empty )$
$reference RefSchema JavaDb2LUWSchemaObjMembers$
$iterate SchemaRefs( each ApplyJavaDb2LUWSchemaObjImpl empty empty )$
$reference RefSchema JavaDb2LUWSchemaObjImpl$
protected PreparedStatement stmtSelectNext$Name$ = null;

$implDb2LUWSchemaReleasePreparedStatements$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetQuotedString$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetNullableString$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetBlobString$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetBoolString$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetInt16String$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetInt32String$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetInt64String$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetUInt16String$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetUInt32String$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetUInt64String$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetFloatString$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetDoubleString$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetNumberString$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetNullableInt32$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetNullableInt16$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetNullableUInt16$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetNullableUInt32$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetNullableUInt64$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetNullableIntByte$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetQuotedDateString$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetQuotedTimeString$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetQuotedTimestampString$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetQuotedTZDateString$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetQuotedTZTimeString$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetQuotedTZTimestampString$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetDateString$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetTimeString$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetTimestampString$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetTZDateString$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetTZTimeString$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetTZTimestampString$$implSchemaDb2LUWGetUuidString$$implSchemaDb2LUWConvertDateString$$implSchemaDb2LUWConvertTimeString$$implSchemaDb2LUWConvertTimestampString$$implSchemaDb2LUWConvertTZDateString$$implSchemaDb2LUWConvertTZTimeString$$implSchemaDb2LUWConvertTZTimestampString$$implSchemaDb2LUWConvertUuidString$
$popto SchemaDef implSchemaCheckOpenTransaction$
table$TableName$ = new $SchemaName$Db2LUW$TableName$Table( this );
